Data:
==What to Check For==

Verify that sensitive data is not logged.

==Why==

If sensitive data is logged, it may be recovered by an attacker if the device is lost or compromised.

==How to Check==

To verify that sensitive data is not logged:

# **Identify sensitive data.** Make a list of types of sensitive information handled by your application. Some examples are:
#* Passwords
#* Encryption keys
#* Personal information
# **Review logging code.** Identify code that generates log entries by searching for references to the //Log// class. Review this code to verify that it does not include sensitive information in log entries.

==How to Fix==

To prevent logging of sensitive data:

# **Identify sensitive data.** Make a list of types of sensitive information handled by your application. Some examples are:
#* Passwords
#* Encryption keys
#* Personal information
# **Identify logging code.** Find all code that uses the //Log// class. 
# **Review logging code.** Examine logging code to make sure that it never includes sensitive data in log entries.

==Privacy Guidelines==

* [[00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000561ff3|Do Not Cache Sensitive Data]]
* [[00000000-0000-0000-0000-0000007e1362|Do Not Log Location Data]]
* [[00000000-0000-0000-0000-0000001dcb79|Do Not Log Sensitive Data]]
* [[00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000629cc3|Delete Cached Data after Use]]

==Privacy Checklists==

* [[00000000-0000-0000-0000-0000003b2aca|Sensitive Data Is Not Cached]]
* [[00000000-0000-0000-0000-0000006c27b2|Location Data Is Not Logged]]
* [[00000000-0000-0000-0000-0000005a7753|Sensitive Data Is Not Logged]]
* [[00000000-0000-0000-0000-0000007c99a7|Cached Data Is Deleted after Use]]

==Additional Resources==

* For more information about logging on Android, please see http://developer.android.com/tools/debugging/debugging-log.html
* For more information about the //Log// class, please see http://developer.android.com/reference/android/util/Log.html
* For a tutorial on Android logging, please see http://mobile.tutsplus.com/tutorials/android/logcat_android-sdk/
